channel.title: Explaining how a server works?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was just wondering, is there any guide that explains how a server works? Like the actual server? How to add new skills, explaining everything etc?
Also, I did google and search this so shut the fuck up.
And I tried to read some java guides, but couldn't find any related to server things, mostly just applications and shit. If you could give me a link to some server related things in the java tutorials that would be great. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Explaining how a server works?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

You’ll learn by analyzing the code in servers, finding which parts handle what, etc. If you want to look at some tutorials, look at the tutorial section.

Read full topic
